titles.title: A concurrent resolution to express the sense of the Congress that a cooperative effort to improve the foreign language skills and international awareness of the American people will help the United States compete economically.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary and Vocational Education.
Referred to Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education.

bill.summary: 3/5/1987--Introduced. Calls upon all levels of Government and the business and educational communities to cooperate in a concerted effort to improve the foreign language skills and international awareness of the American people in order to increase American international economic competitiveness.
